name: Deluge
short_description: Full-featured cross-platform BitTorrent client with plugin support.
description: Deluge is a lightweight, full-featured BitTorrent client that can run as a daemon with web interface. Features include plugin system for extended functionality, web UI, remote management, DHT, peer exchange, encryption, bandwidth scheduling, and RSS support. Cross-platform with low memory usage. The LinuxServer.io image includes the Deluge daemon with web UI.
